body:
Comment 2 by **theseeker**: 
I'm not building from source (don't have hg)  I'm running the contents of
gowin32_2010-10-20.zip which at the time of writing is the latest binary package
release.  

Since the patch you're referring to was on the 21st, I'll assume it's fixed already
then.  I'll comment again when the next build is released.
